location.description: This is the training room where the students practice to fight. There are training dummies to your left as well as a training swords and training shields nearby.

training shield.description: A wooden kite shield used by students while training.
training shield.name: Training Shield

training sword.description: A wooden sword used by students while training.
training sword.name: Training Sword

wooden stick.description: A wooden stick that's about as long as your arm. Not a very useful weapon.
wooden stick.name: Wooden Stick

training dummy.description: A training dummy used by students while learning to fight.
training dummy.name: Training Dummy

location.name: The Training Room

advtrainingroom.description: This is the advanced training room. You should not stick around here unless you know how to fight!

goblin.description:
A three foot grotesque fairy with razor sharp teeth, pointy ears and green skin.
 Will attack if provoked!
goblin.name: Goblin

advtrainingroom.name: Advanced Training Room

boathouse.description: This is the Lucaria lake boathouse.
boathouse.name: The Boathouse

courtyard.description: The expansive courtyard boasts a myriad of sculptures and beautiful architecture. You can see students and teachers milling around.
courtyard.name: The Courtyard

crossroads.description:
A literal crossroad with a wooden sign that says: 
 Elven Creek LEFT 
 Elven Woods RIGHT 
 Lucaria Lake UP. 

 Enter the Woods at your own risk!!!
crossroads.name: Crossroads

dungeon.description: It's cold and wet here underground. The long corridor leads to a single locked door where a sentient door knock is looking at you.
dungeon.name: Dungeon

elvenwoods.description: The woods are eerie and dangerous but beautiful. Careful not to venture too far in, you will certainly get lost!
elvenwoods.name: The Elven Woods

lake.description: Vast lake, Lucaria. You can see the sunlight reflecting off its surface. The view is rather nice! Up ahead you can see the boathouse.
lake.name: Lucaria Lake

lecturehall.description: A small auditorium that is the main lecture hall where non-combat lessons take place.
lecturehall.name: Lecture Hall

magiccafe.description: A small cafe in Elven Creek, that many witches come to. It's famous for it's vast selection of brews.
magiccafe.name: The Toadstool Cafe

meadow.description: A small cafe in Elven Creek, that many witches come to. It's famous for it's vast selection of brews.
meadow.name: The Toadstool Cafe

trainingroom.description: This is the training room where the students practice to fight. There are training dummies to your left as well as a training swords and training shields nearby.

training shield.description: A wooden kite shield used by students while training.
training shield.name: Training Shield

training sword.description: A wooden sword used by students while training.
training sword.name: Training Sword

wooden stick.description: A wooden stick that's about as long as your arm. Not a very useful weapon.
wooden stick.name: Wooden Stick

training dummy.description: A training dummy used by students while learning to fight.
training dummy.name: Training Dummy

trainingroom.name: The Training Room
